description:
He is the store manager of a newly opened convenient store close to Asami`s & Ichimaru`s house.
Falls in love with Asami at first sight, when she visits his store, at the grand opening, despite coming with Ichimaru. Later that very same day, he proposes to her! - but she promptly turns him down, much to his regret. However he does not give up.
name: Sanjitsu Sankishi
